resources.string: The latest Android Beta version shows signs of a much detailed dark mode roll out unlike what was expected. As reported by WABetaInfo, a blog that tracks WhatsApp developments, the app\'s Android Beta version 2.20.31 highlights that new dark solid colours are available in the build. This essentially means that there is a possibility that the dark mode feature can have other dark colours instead of just black.
The latest Android Beta version shows signs of a much detailed dark mode roll out unlike what was expected. As reported by WABetaInfo, a blog that tracksuild.
I wake up every morning literally with a smile on my face, grateful for another day.
How I hope you have a refreshing afternoon. Take a deep breath, and you will smell the love in the air.
Buddy, may your evening be filled with all the best and beautiful things of life.
The best bridge between despair and hope is a good night’s sleep.
Power resides where men believe it resides. It’s a trick, a shadow on the wall. And, a very small man can cast a very large shadow.
All my life men like you have sneered at me, and all my life I\'ve been knocking men like you into the dust.
You need to take your enemy’s side if you’re going to see things the way they do. — Tyrion Lannister
